schema.name: Device
schema.description: The top-level object for an CPE Device

schema.name: MemoryStatus
schema.description: Status of the device's volatile physical memory

schema.name: Total
schema.description: The total physical RAM, in Kulobytes

schema.name: Free
schema.description: The free physical RAM, currently available on the device

schema.name: CPUTime
schema.description: The amount of time in milliseconds that the process has spent taking up CPU time since the process was started
